version_description: New for 2017, this version has a more streamlined interface, and allows quick access to the App Store in order to upgrade to Tap Tool Pro (advert free).

Thanks for using Tap Tool, and for your feedback and enhancement requests!
What's new:
• The app has been updated to work beautifully on the new iPhone X.
• The display now shows the timer counting in real time.
• You can now Pause the timer, and Resume later.
• The display now includes a Repeat count and the total time between first and last tap, which is useful for timing any repeating process e.g. pendulums, bouncing springs.
Still the same great app, updated for iOS 13!
